title: A Business-Minded Way To Make Tough Family Decisions
description: Having elementary-aged kids at home can mean a maze of tough decisions about how to run your family and what's right for your small children. Economist Emily Oster offers ways to streamline decision-making with strategies — and data — that work in the business world.

itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Make tough decisions easier for your school-aged kids and family with proven data — and strategies — from the business world.
